text: The Basque Cup, more commonly known as Euskal Kopa,Basque pronunciation: . is the regional preseason basketball cup competition that has been organized by the Basque Basketball Federation since 2011, in the Basque Country, Spain. Nowadays, the teams that play in this preseason cup competition are the Liga ACB, LEB Oro, LEB Plata and Liga EBA teams. ==Performance by club== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Club ! Winners ! Runners-up !
